# ants

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides information on common ant species in central and northern Europe. 
This includes images on worker and gynes taken from [antweb](https://www.antweb.org),
summary of identification characters, mating system and nest ecology.
